SELECT DISTINCT A.BIN_RegionID AS cityId,
A.RegionNameForeign AS cityName,
A.RegionNameChinese AS cityName,
A.RegionNameChinese AS cityName,
B.BIN_RegionID AS provinceId,
B.RegionNameForeign AS provinceName,
B.RegionNameChinese AS provinceName,
B.RegionNameChinese AS provinceName,
C.BIN_RegionID AS regionId
,C.RegionNameForeign AS regionName
,C.RegionNameChinese AS regionName
,C.RegionNameChinese AS regionName
,D.CounterCode AS counterCode ,oz.DepartName AS counterName
,null AS counterCode ,null AS counterName
FROM Basis.BIN_Region A, Basis.BIN_Region B, Basis.BIN_Region C, Basis.BIN_Region AD
JOIN Basis.BIN_CounterInfo D ON(D.BIN_RegionID = AD.BIN_RegionID) JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization oz ON(D.BIN_OrganizationID = oz.BIN_OrganizationID) JOIN(
)dp ON(dp.BIN_OrganizationID = oz.BIN_OrganizationID)
WHERE C.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND
C.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND
D.ValidFlag='1' AND oz.ValidFlag='1' AND
C.RegionType = '0' AND A.NodeID.GetAncestor(1) = B.NodeID AND B.NodeID.GetAncestor(1) = C.NodeID AND AD.NodeID.IsDescendantOf(A.NodeID)=1 AND A.ValidFlag = '1' AND B.ValidFlag = '1' AND C.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT DISTINCT ci.CounterCode AS counterCode,
ct.BIN_RegionID AS cityID,
ci.BIN_RegionID AS cityID,
ci.BIN_ChannelID AS channelID,
oz.NameForeign AS counterName
oz.DepartName AS counterName
oz.DepartName AS counterName
FROM Basis.BIN_CounterInfo ci JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization oz ON(ci.BIN_OrganizationID = oz.BIN_OrganizationID) JOIN (
)dp ON(dp.BIN_OrganizationID = oz.BIN_OrganizationID)
,Basis.BIN_Region ct ,Basis.BIN_Region ctd
WHERE ci.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND
ct.BIN_RegionID = #city# AND ctd.BIN_RegionID = ci.BIN_RegionID AND ctd.NodeID.IsDescendantOf(ct.NodeID)=1 AND ctd.ValidFlag = '1' AND ct.ValidFlag = '1' AND
ci.BIN_ChannelID = #channel# AND
ci.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND
ci.ValidFlag = '1' AND oz.ValidFlag = '1'
SELECT TOP 1 BIN_BrandInfoID AS brandInfoId, BIN_OrganizationInfoID AS organizationInfoId FROM Basis.BIN_BrandInfo WHERE BrandCode = #brandCode#

SELECT DISTINCT bc.BIN_ChannelID AS id
,bc.ChannelNameForeign AS name
,bc.ChannelName AS name
,bc.ChannelName AS name
,ci.CounterCode AS counterCode ,oz.DepartName AS counterName
,null AS counterCode ,null AS counterName
FROM Basis.BIN_Channel bc
JOIN Basis.BIN_CounterInfo ci ON(bc.BIN_ChannelID = ci.BIN_ChannelID) JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization oz ON(ci.BIN_OrganizationID = oz.BIN_OrganizationID) JOIN (
)dp ON(dp.BIN_OrganizationID = oz.BIN_OrganizationID)
WHERE bc.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND
bc.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND
ci.ValidFlag = '1' AND oz.ValidFlag = '1' AND
bc.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT A.BelongFaction AS id, A.CounterCode AS counterCode, A.CounterNameIF AS counterName FROM Basis.BIN_CounterInfo A JOIN (
)dp ON(A.BIN_OrganizationID = dp.BIN_OrganizationID) where A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.ValidFlag = '1' AND A.BelongFaction IS NOT NULL ORDER BY A.CounterCode

SELECT DISTINCT convert (varchar, B.FromDate, 121)+ '~' + convert (varchar, B.ToDate, 121) AS levelDate FROM Members.BIN_MemberLevel A, Members.BIN_MemberLevelDetail B WHERE A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND B.BIN_MemberLevelID = A.BIN_MemberLevelID AND B.ToDate >= #busDate# AND A.ValidFlag = '1' AND B.ValidFlag = '1'
ORDER BY LevelDate ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM Basis.BIN_BrandInfo A, Basis.BIN_CounterInfo B WHERE A.BrandCode = #brandCode# AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = B.BIN_BrandInfoID AND B.CounterCode = #counterCode# AND A.ValidFlag = '1' AND B.ValidFlag = '1'
SELECT CounterNameIF FROM Basis.BIN_CounterInfo WHERE CounterCode = #counterCode# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId#

SELECT COUNT(A.BIN_OrganizationID) FROM Basis.BIN_Organization A JOIN (
)B ON(B.BIN_OrganizationID = A.BIN_OrganizationID) WHERE A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.Type = '4' AND A.BIN_CityID IN
#cityId[]#
AND A.ValidFlag='1'

SELECT COUNT(A.BIN_OrganizationID) FROM Basis.BIN_CounterInfo A JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization B ON(A.BIN_OrganizationID = B.BIN_OrganizationID) JOIN (
)C ON(C.BIN_OrganizationID = B.BIN_OrganizationID) WHERE A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.BIN_ChannelID IN
#channelId[]#
AND A.ValidFlag='1'
